verses.name: Mark 12:28
verses.text: And one of the scribes came, and having heard them reasoning together, and perceiving that he had answered them well, asked him, Which is the first commandment of all?

verses.name: Mark 12:29
verses.text: And Jesus answered him, The first of all the commandments is, Hear, O Israel; The Lord our God is one Lord:

verses.name: Mark 12:30
verses.text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind, and with all thy strength: this is the first commandment.
